turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want you to order me a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks would you like the order to be placed for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm closest to the Starbucks on Eubank in Albuquerque, so get it there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. What kind of coffee do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm want something cold, so maybe an iced coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have iced lattes, mochas, americanos, macchiatos, and cappuccinos, or frappuccinos blended with ice.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A macchiato sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What flavor would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They have a caramel one, right? That one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what kind of milk would you like it made with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have half-and-half?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, sorry. They have almond milk, coconut milk, soy milk, nonfat milk, 2% milk, and whole milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk. Everything else tastes watery to me!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size should the order be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to keep it under 300 calories. How many calories are in a Venti?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A Venti would have 390 calories, but a Grande size only has 280.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll get a Grande then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, so that's a Grande iced caramel macchiato with whole milk. Would you like anything with it? Sugar, whipped cream, or anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the drink. I don't want to add extra calories.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I've placed an order for a Grande iced caramel macchiato with whole milk. Your order will be ready for pickup at the Starbucks on Eubank in Albuquerque soon, and your receipt will be texted to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Enjoy your coffee!

items.name: Sugar, whipped cream, or anything else?
